description.value: This operation is used to return a patient summary using the IPS profile.

documentation.value: When the logical id of the patient is not used, servers MAY choose to support patient selection based on provided identifier
A specific profile for the patient summary may be specified. By default, servers MAY use the [Bundle profile](./StructureDefinition-Bundle-uv-ips.html)

Servers MAY choose to allow any graph definition to be specified, but MAY require that the client choose a graph definition from a specific list of known supported definitions. The server is not required to support a formal definition of the graph on the end point

The Bundle returned is a document conforming to the specified input profile parameter or the International Patient Summary [Bundle profile](./StructureDefinition-Bundle-uv-ips.html) (if not otherwise specified)
